Metadata.Title: CVE-2022-23806 affecting package golang for versions less than 1.18.8-3
Metadata.Description: CVE-2022-23806 affecting package golang for versions less than 1.18.8-3. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package golang is earlier than 1.18.8-3, affected by CVE-2022-23806
